entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:05 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
